Body:
assert AABB([(0, 1)]).perimeter == 0
len1 = 4
len2 = 5.2
p_exp = 2 * (len1 + len2)
assert AABB([(0, len1), (-2, -2 + len2)]).perimeter == p_exp
assert AABB([(-3, -2), (4, 5), (0, 1)]).perimeter == 6
assert AABB([(2, 2), (3, 3), (-1, -1)]).perimeter == 0
assert AABB([(4, 4), (0, 1), (0, 1)]).perimeter == 2
